title: Ameracat Logo - Bold Italic Font
content:
Stumped with this one.

Looks like some sort of Bold Italic. The leading A is a larger size than the rest of the logo.

I've found some fonts similar, but nothing came close the "C"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ameracat_6553.PNG)

Font: 

 Eurostile Extended #2 (Bold) (Italic) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133720/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: wakerider017

comments.content: Thanks! Looks dead on to me. Matching boat reg numbers will look great!
